website_summaries.verdict: Classic style goes with any aesthetic, making it a great gift.
pros: Brushed stainless steel handles and a eye catching display box make this a great gift option

customer_reviews.title: an awesome set of cheese knives
customer_reviews.text: I had resisted getting cheese knives for years. Every year it was a collection of mismatched cheese knives from different gift baskets that I've received over the years. This year...a matching set! They are awesome and really did make a difference especially with the larger and harder blocks of cheese. I can see that they will last a long time with good care. Very solidly made and received many compliments about them.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cheese cuttery set.
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice in person. Great quality too! I choose the black handle ones! Because everyone I know has the stainless steel. I like to be different :)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: Gave to daughter and she loves to bring out for cheese boards.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Butler

customer_reviews.title: my sister doesn't have any good cheese cutters
customer_reviews.text: When I got the cheese globe, I couldn't resist getting these to go along with it, my sister doesn't have any good cheese cutters, until now
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product. Used twice and this is what happened ....
customer_reviews.author: Susan R Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Wisconsin Says "Heck Yeah!"
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! The handles are a soft brushed silver and nicely sized and shaped for most hands. The variety of tools makes it easy to serve a variety of cheeses which is how cheese is supposed be presented, I guess. This is a really well-priced, useful set.
customer_reviews.author: smarie quinn

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great choice! Everyone always comments on them!
customer_reviews.author: MuffinandCupcakesMommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, may have to purchase one for myself!
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, appear to be quality set. Packaging leaves a little to be desired when gifting the items, but I got one of them engraved at Things Remembered and paired it with some cheese boards for a wedding shower gift. Bride loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sapienza

customer_reviews.title: Nice for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set as a gift. The recipient was thrilled with the item, they were sturdy and attractive. The handles had no obvious defects, and the metal portion has held up to several washings with no signs of wear. For the price, this set was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: The stainless quality is horrible. Good looking and solid pieces but cheesy material
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get to use them. Washed them before the first use and the next day they were full of rust!! The stainless quality is horrible. Good looking and solid pieces but cheesy material. Pun intended Sent them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Graham

customer_reviews.title: Who Cut the Cheese?
customer_reviews.text: Great! So much better than ones with wooden handles. Made to last!
customer_reviews.author: MPL

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern while sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, easy to use on hard cheeses and meats. I love the sleek and modern look they have. They were definitely a great addition to my hosting supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Creating Everyday

customer_reviews.title: Great knives, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great knives and great value. Shipped fast with Amazon Prime and arrived on time. Look much more expensive than they are, worked and looked great with my slate cheese board. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Got this set on sale and it's rather small, but the knife is razor sharp and I use it all the time. Cute set.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful pieces and came in a very attractive
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful pieces and came in a very attractive, expensive looking package design. They match perfectly with the Da Vinci wood cutting board. Very sturdy and classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Superb, great buy - knives for different cheese types
customer_reviews.text: Love these! the solid single piece construction looks and feel nice in the hand. They perform nice and look stylish on cheese serving slates. I have not dishwashed (machine washed) these, as with all knives I intend to keep them sharp. I hand wash them and dry them immediately and they have not lost their sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cheese board finisher
customer_reviews.text: These cheese knives give a good look to my new slate cheese board, and handle different shapes & types of cheeses well. I've seen them before with wooden handles and these stainless steel ones look so much better. But mainly, all my visitors will be totally ticked they don't have one too!
customer_reviews.author: Kafte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cheeselover.
customer_reviews.text: These cheese knives are great. The handles have a nice weight and the blades remain sharp after months of daily use. They're also easy to clean and maintain. Good value fot the cost. Perfect for serving cheese and fruit platters. The set includes a knife for every kind of cheese. A great gift for a lover of all artisan cheeses!
customer_reviews.author: Urban One

customer_reviews.title: Feel very fancy with these
customer_reviews.text: Oh man! These are great! The look good and they work well. I keep them in the box they came in because they look like they are on display. I would recommend this product to any cheese-lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: C-Mad

customer_reviews.title: A handy set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a wine-and-cheese tasting party and was very pleased. The knives look good, are easy to handle, and I liked getting four in a set so I could spread them out over the table with different cheese plates. I think this set is a very reasonable deal for what you get in terms of both quality and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: seedless grape

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and modern. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheka Handal

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These cheese knives are adorable. My only problem is that they started to rust after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice! I got them as a gift for my brother and he loved it. They look great and work well. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these and the quality is good..
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these and the quality is good.... just wish they had a guide to tell you which knife is to be used with what kind of cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Simple design! Perfect addition to a Cheese themed Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Watamark

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great cheese knives. I put one per cheese so that they have their own individual knives. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price and looked so elegant on my cheese board
customer_reviews.author: Rangegal

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: These cheese knives are just as described....and a bargain at the price. They are sharp, and reasonably well shaped for their intended purpose. I have run them thru the dishwasher with no ill effects so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Set them in the sink to wash and forgot. Woke up the next morning to find rust all over them. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Wappes

customer_reviews.title: and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a cheese board at a wedding, and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. in TN

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift to go with a slate cheeseboard, the recipient loved them and they really look like a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Look great for entertaining. They are heavy enough to be able to handle them
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quality knives
customer_reviews.text: This set of a variety of shapes for cutting and serving various types of cheese is great. The price is reasonable and delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: They were great and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got for a gift for my mom. They were great and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Jurchisin

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter and her husband loved the cheese Knives....fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set that looks good and works well on all cheeses we've used it on so far!........ good price as well
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Look better than they actually feel.
customer_reviews.text: They are reasonable quality for the price, a little light, but look fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!  Classy looking!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheese set. They look attractive and feel well-made. They look nice on our cheese platter and work well. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Enhance your Cheese
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with them. Used Christmas and got many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this set a couple of times, but so far, so good! The knives did a great job cutting the cheese, while they all held up well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was wanting
customer_reviews.text: Just received them. They look great! Haven’t used them yet but they look pretty sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Davies

customer_reviews.title: Does not wash up well - discoloration after the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not wash up well - discoloration after the first use. I’d return it if I still had the box and hadn’t used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely buffet serving pieces !
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, beautiful horesdeureves tools! They are so well made they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Spann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice cheese knives set, looks just like the photos
customer_reviews.author: alejandra gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: well crafted - a find on amazon
customer_reviews.text: The cheese knives are well crafted and the chrome finish looks very nice - definitely a find and one I have recommended to one of my friends. It adds a nice touch to a cheese tray.
customer_reviews.author: Gkatarina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Given to my brother and sister-in-law for christmas along with J.K. Adams 16-Inch-by-12-Inch Slate Cheese Tray. They loved these knives. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety pack that is inexpensive. We use each of these knives... nice when setting out a cheese platter with some vino. They look stylish, and they cut cheese. Not too much to think about.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel F. Stolpe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Terrific set for a great price. Bought to replace some I broke and these are adorable, and very sturdy. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these tools. I received them on time and they were wonderful. Good weight, nice packaging, good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice set, I like it and it works well. Haven't had any complaints yet. I got it because I was tired of using regular knives and this set was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: What cute little cheese knives! They were a big hit as gifts this year. Everyone loved them. You can't help but smile when you see them. Because I gave them as gifts I have not taken them out of the package and can not speak to their quality, weight or functionality. But CUTE
customer_reviews.author: Susan McClain

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality....
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality cheese knives, especially for the price. They are lightweight but do not seem at all 'cheap'.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than I like but these have held up to our use so ...
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I like but these have held up to our use so far. We got them for cheese platters at our special events so they don't get used too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have found them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for these for years! So happy to have found them. Small and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend and they are enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Haglin

customer_reviews.title: Function and Form perfection
customer_reviews.text: Just as you would hope, heavy but elegant. A great gift for a cheese lover. A nice middle-ground between modern and traditional.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheese Knives
customer_reviews.text: I brought back a set of cheese knives from Switzerland and they were confiscated at the airport so I had to buy another set. These a cute little cheese knives and they work great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sales

customer_reviews.title: but the knives work great. Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Storage tray that they come in leaves a little to be desired, but the knives work great. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daems

customer_reviews.title: Cheese serving set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this serving set for my bachelor son. He entertains a lot (both indoors and out) and I decided it would make a good addition to his serving table. It's sturdy, has a nice stainless steel finish and looks more "macho" than other cheese knives. It was a good gift; he liked it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Oly1

customer_reviews.title: Very classy set of cheese cutlery
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice and classy set of cheese cutlery. Strongly recommend it. This is great for light brunch and family/friends gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Camilien JW Saint-Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Great  Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, works well on all kinds of cheese. This set was priced well below the Sets in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: mt. girl

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Chose this set because of the one-piece handle. Fits in my hand well and has good weight compared to others I had looked at. The knives are sharp, nice looking and do a fantastic job cutting and serving cheese.
customer_reviews.author: gmb

customer_reviews.title: Classy / Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese knife set. The quality is great and I've been using them for months with various charcuterie spreads and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, the price was great and while they are a little smaller than I would like, they work just fine and are a nice touch to a cheese tray.
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did like! Elegant and was deliver faster than expected
customer_reviews.author: Ana Carolina C F Gomes

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product when I opened the package. It was shipped in a very timely manner.I really love these knives!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Set of Cheese Knives
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter was looking for. They are light weight but solid and easy to clean. Just what a busy hostess needs.
customer_reviews.author: Revon M. WIlcox

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking set on the cheese plate, and feels smooth and comfortable in your hand. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! One solid piece, sleek design and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kroker

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Knives....these are great!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase. I bought one set for myself and two sets as gifts. Now I wish I had more!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Heinzmann

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a reasonable price. Good quality and exactly what i needed for my cheese plate. Im happy with it and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bonanzo

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise super cute. I've gone back to using my regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not have huge hands but I found these handles are a little too short. Otherwise super cute. I've gone back to using my regular knives so I feel it was a waste of money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Pooky Bear

customer_reviews.title: Practical and elegant
customer_reviews.text: This set of four cheese knives are stainless steel but brushed resembling brushed nickel. They look wonderful on a porcelain or granite chees tray. More importantly, they work beautifully with the cheeses. The package has a listing of which utensil to use with which type of cheese and I cut it out to keep for future uses. I was so pleased with them I bought another set for my son.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hitch

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! I have had mine for a couple of months and have only dishwasher mine without problems. I LOVE cheese, but I have also used some on a butter tasting I had. Works greats.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wigington

customer_reviews.title: great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for years and the still look brand new. They have no chips or rust. I love using these to entertain.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy variety for cheese serving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who was opening her own art studio and wanted to have an open house. She loved the servers. They came with a nice choice of handles, but my friend is a nature-lover, so I chose the wood. She could not have been happier with that part of my gift.
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: THE FACES ARE HILARIOUS!!! Seriously, how can you have a bad day when your cheese knife smiles at you as you cut the cheese?!?!? Solid design and haven't rusted in the dishwasher so quality items.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: These knives are so gorgeous. Even prettier in person. I bought several sets as part of Christmas gifts and was pleasantly surprised at the great quality and the very attractive packaging. I have since decided I need to buy some of these for myself. They are a fantastic value compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: The items have a good look and feel, especially for the money. Bought one set, and liked them so much more than what I could find in stores, that I ordered two more sets to give as gifts paired with a nice cheese board.
customer_reviews.author: Tula Holic

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. Really liked the polished look. Very modern. Like all the choices. This was part of a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: They did look beautiful on my cheese platter and proved to be very ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Knife set for the style and the variety. They unfortunately started to rust where the handle meets the blade. They did look beautiful on my cheese platter and proved to be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: LesMo

customer_reviews.title: Works great on all kinds of cheeses
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend calls these ninja throwing knives and for all I know they could be. Works great on all kinds of cheeses, soft, hard, semi-soft. Generally happy with the purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Raspberry Moon

customer_reviews.title: Solid, better than wood
customer_reviews.text: These replaced some similar, much older knives with wooden handles that had deteriorated over the years. These appear to be very robust. Time will tell if they rust, and how they hold their edge, but initially I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: S. McGeady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are nice and will do the job. Classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian chica

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w these knives. So elegant and simple, very sturdy and the brushed metal look looks really nice. love serving cheese on my wooden tray along with these knives. got tired of using reg butter knives, so happy w this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Great present.
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES cheese. So much so that I think he would have married a round of cheese instead of me. These are sharp and the weight on the handle is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tanks Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Always have the right knife for the right product
customer_reviews.text: A rule in my house growing up...so I just had to have these knives for the new cheese dome It is nice to not a struggle with certain harder cheese or with those that are soft and creamy because they need extra attention with the knife
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and solid
customer_reviews.text: Replaced peeling wooden handled cheese cutters with these. They work beautifully on assorted cheeses, and look realty nice. Nothing cheap looking about them. I hand wash them, and they always look great.
customer_reviews.author: TXsun

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these little guys after attending a holiday party and seeing the caterer use something similar on their cheese boards. While these seem to have hollow handles (the heft isn't there as would be in a higher quality product) these do an absolutely great job cutting cheese and are perfect for our home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Vermont

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have to honestly say this is one of the best set of cheese knives I have ever owned. I just used them for a neighborhood party and couldn't believe how wonderful they were for cutting smoothly through the cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ricucci

customer_reviews.title: Well made! I brought these as a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made! I brought these as a gift and paired with the Madeira Provo Teak Edge-Grain Bread Board. I would buy a set for myself. Much nicer than the ones with the wooden handle.
customer_reviews.author: Malory D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and everyone commented on them at my party! If you are in need of cheese knives, buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Karenrene

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Great buy--these have held up quite well (we purchased them to replace some wooden-handled cheese knives that were starting to fall apart). Frequently used, fine in the dishwasher--I'm pleased with this set. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Squid Ro

customer_reviews.title: So cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: These little things are perfect, they serve their purpose, are very sharp and neat looking! And these little things are so affordable for the way they look and cut! It's great deal! Now go spend what you saved on some good cheese!
customer_reviews.author: RYZ

customer_reviews.title: Prodyne Cheese Servers
customer_reviews.text: What a steal at this price! Dishwasher well and look beautiful for all your cheese serving needs. Blades are just sharp enough. You will get many compliments on this set! Would definitely recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a nice set of cheese knives for a while. Have bought a couple of sets only to be disappointed. These are fabulous! Have some weight to them and feel very expensive. So far I have used them twice and they cut through the cheese without making a mess or breaking it. Love the handles too!
customer_reviews.author: VeRo Mel

customer_reviews.title: sharp and shiny
customer_reviews.text: These are good little cheese knives and though they don't exactly hide finger prints and cheesy prints...they are great at what they aee suppose to do and a quick wipe down keeps them looking good.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and solid set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these for me and loved them so much I purchased another set as a family Christmas exchange gift. It was the gift everyone was 'fighting' over. Sleek and solid design.
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The set is really nice and elegant looking. I thought the value was very good. The spreaders are light and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Viv Julia

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with the purchase. I would highly recommend to anything who is thinking about getting this product. Looks and works great and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ike

product_meta.title: Prodyne K-4-S Stainless Steel Cheese Knives, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Style Name:Stainless SteelThese utensils will do it all! Hold, cut, slice shave and break any type of cheese. The tools are the ultimate in quality and style with easy grip handles and stainless steel blades.
feature_bullets: Easy to grip stainless steel handles
Great for all types of cheese
Perfect serving tools for any occasion
Great as a gift for the cheese lover in your life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars248 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
